idare.imagenode.ColorManagement.ColorScale

  • Packages that use ColorScale 
    Package Description
    idare.imagenode.ColorManagement
    This Package contains classes used for Displaying and defining ColorMaps available in IDARE.
    idare.imagenode.ColorManagement.ColorMapTypes
    This Package contains the ColorMapTypes available in IDARE.
